column5: Great News from KW Grand River, I went for my 4th Chemo Treatment today & met with the Doctor 1st, the 18+cm Mass I had, has been shrunk to 5.3cm, if it doesn't shrink small enough I could still need radiation come late November or December but we'll cross that bridge when we get there, lets go fishing Thanx & Tight Lines Richard
Good to hear the cocktail they picked is working Richard!!
Great news...now go catch a fish...
That's the kinds stuff we like to hear
really good news sbk. hopefully it will go like this  18-->5.3-->0
Keep shrinking. Hope the next news is even better Richard.
Awesome news Spinner!!! Keep thinking positive and positive things will happen Bud...FISH ON!!!!!!
